title: Exploring the notions and voices of typography: TypeSHED11, Wellington, New Zealand
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316201132/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 4.Mar.2008 8.13am 

TypeSHED11, Wellington, New Zealand  
11-15 February 2009

We are delighted to announce the first of our invited guest speakers on our website: [http://www.typeshed11.co.nz](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316201132/http:/www.typeshed11.co.nz/ "http://www.typeshed11.co.nz")

++watch our website for guest speaker announcements every few weeks++

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

What else is happening?  
The dialogue continues with typographers, type designers, designers, and those in other disciplines with a connection to typography, as we construct the programme, and gather sponsors.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Proudly sponsored (thus far) by

silver  
Springload  
sponsor-a-speaker  
Strategy Design and Advertising  
bronze  
Experimenta  
Wellington City Council  
base  
City Gallery Wellington  
FontLab  
Gordon Harris - The Art and Graphic Store  
Massey University  
with the support of  
Designers Institute of New Zealand

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Sponsor TypeSHED11  
We offer sponsors the opportunity for promotion and international visibility with TypeSHED11, New Zealandâ€™s first-ever international typography symposium. For more information, contact us at:  
 [sponsor@typeshed11.co.nz](mailto:sponsor@typeshed11.co.nz)

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

TypeSHED11, Wellington, New Zealand  
11-15 February 2009  
A five-day international typography symposium  
in collaboration with Typevents LLP  
 [http://www.typeshed11.co.nz](http://web.archive.org/web/20080316201132/http:/www.typeshed11.co.nz/ "http://www.typeshed11.co.nz")
author: Miss Tiffany
